title: Fps drops
body: Since patch 7.13 released ive gone from a steady 200 fps with little to no changes to bouncing between 63-120 fps uncapped. All my graphic software is up to date and i cant find any other reason as to why the fps keeps dropping. game gets clunky and hard to play with so much frame change.

replies.body: Update, after reinstalling game and uninstaling any potentially bothersome programs i was still experiencing the fps drops. but after patch 7.16 i seem to have fps drops in certain areas of the map, most notably around the buffs ill have a huge fps drop for a few seconds before leveling out at about 100 fps. in base i usually sit at about 242 fps, in lane about 130- 110. where as i use to hit 200+ all over map.

There could be other factors involved like potentially bad game files.  Just to be sure, run through the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to rule out possibilities.  Test it in a custom, though, to be safe.  I hope that helps!
